results.releaseNotes:
Features:

- Conditions can now be made using measurements that are for the entire day rather than hourly (e.g. the time at which the wind gust speed is the highest)
- Measurements are now split into two sections, "Hourly" and "Daily"
- Measurements now show a explanation below them in the measurements screen
- Time based conditions can now use "Before" and "After" as their symbol
- When searching for a location there is now an activity indicator while the search is in progress
- Conditions are no longer shown on the rules screen so more rules can be shown on one screen

Bug Fixes:

- Conditions based on time's now show the measurements name
- When fetching your current location the text no longer clips on smaller devices
- When selecting a symbol the screen is now titled "Select Symbol" instead of "Select Measurement"
- Fixed An issue which left a visible white box while configuring conditions in certain scenarios
- Long Measurements now fit in the Add Condition screen on smaller devices
- The "Now" label showing the current time on forecasts now only shows when it should
- Fixed an issue where buttons would display unformatted values in some scenarios
- Fixed an issue where swipe back would no longer work after selecting a location
- Met rule time ranges when using "hourly" intervals now end at the correct time rather than one hour later in some scenarios
- Fixed some layout issues on the Add Rule Group screen when in landscape
